entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:50 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning except temperature steady near zero inland.
